descriptions.## Overview: Brief introduction to the research topic and objectives (80-120 words)
descriptions.## Key Contributions: Main advances and novel contributions (100-150 words)

descriptions.## Overall Quality Score: Provide overall score (1-5) with brief justification (50-80 words)
descriptions.## Clarity Assessment: Evaluate writing clarity with score and specific examples (80-120 words)
descriptions.## Structure and Organization: Assess organization with score and structural observations (80-120 words)
descriptions.## Technical Accuracy: Review technical correctness with score and evidence (80-120 words)
descriptions.## Readability: Evaluate readability with score and specific issues (60-100 words)
descriptions.## Specific Issues Found: List concrete issues with manuscript references (100-150 words)

section_requirements.Overall Quality Score: Must include: **Score: X/5** format where X is 1-5
section_requirements.All scoring sections: Each section with 'Assessment' or 'Accuracy' must include **Score: X/5**
section_requirements.Specific Issues Found: Must quote or reference specific manuscript sections
section_requirements.Recommendations: Must be actionable and specific to manuscript content

descriptions.## Methodology Overview: Summarize the methodology used in the manuscript (100-150 words)
descriptions.## Research Design Assessment: Evaluate the research design and approach (120-180 words)
descriptions.## Strengths: Identify methodological strengths with evidence (100-150 words)
descriptions.## Weaknesses: Identify methodological weaknesses with evidence (100-150 words)

descriptions.## Summary: Brief overview of key improvement areas (80-120 words)
descriptions.## High Priority Improvements: Critical issues requiring immediate attention (150-200 words)
descriptions.## Medium Priority Improvements: Important but not critical improvements (120-180 words)
descriptions.## Overall Recommendation: Final recommendation: Accept with Minor Revisions, Accept with Major Revisions, or Revise and Resubmit (80-120 words)

section_requirements.All improvement sections: Each improvement must include: WHAT (the issue), WHY (why it matters), HOW (how to address it)
section_requirements.Overall Recommendation: Must choose exactly ONE: 'Accept with Minor Revisions', 'Accept with Major Revisions', or 'Revise and Resubmit'

descriptions.## English Abstract: Technical abstract in English (200-400 words) covering: research objective, methodology, key findings, significance
descriptions.## {target_language} Translation: Complete and accurate translation in {target_language}, preserving technical terminology and scientific accuracy

section_requirements.English Abstract: Must include: research objective and motivation, methodology overview, key findings and results, significance and implications
section_requirements.{target_language} Translation: Must be complete translation (not summary), preserve technical terms, use native script (not transliteration), maintain formal academic tone
